title: THE GAME HAS CRASHED AFTER WINNING GAME
body: I was in my final series game and we won and the screen went to waiting for stats, but i clicked skip cause it was taking too long, then it says the game has crash please try to reconnect i try and it says unable to connect to server, it was my finally series game to silver 2 and it says if i leave i will lose series and i dont want to have that series go to waste to try something that may not work, how can i fix this?

replies.body: got same problem here. keep crashing and shutting down my pc after the 2nd round game started. pls fix asap :(

and a friend was in the game he left and logged back in and it still said that so i dont know what to do neither of us can connect to game and it wont go away so its like we may not be able to play anymore

If that happens you just have to take a break for a few hours, then the game will automatically release you from that game and let you join another. Its a built in fail safe to prevent this sort of situation.

Hey xxxWHITEGHOSTxxx,

After reviewing your latest message, it appears that this may have been simply a display issue.  If the game finished, but it failed when attempting to go to the End-Game statistics screen, then this will not count against your promotion series.  Rest assured, I also performed an in-depth audit of your account, and was able to confirm your game recorded correctly.  You can see this here:

LEAGUE_POINTS_UPDATE_WIN	 | LP: 122 | Mini Series Wins: 1 |	2013-09-30 06:25:09 PDT

I hope this helps alleviate some confusion!  I do sincerely apologize that you experienced this display glitch!

Actually, here in Oceania I am having the same probably just now. But they are fixing the problem apparently ;P
